topic.title: How to fix 0 trackers? How and where to get more trackers?
topic.body:
I can only access a few zites, like ZeroTalk.
But for most zites i want to visit i get "TRACKER CONNECTION ERROR DETECTED."

On my Hello page it says 0/29 trackers..

1610655097_13M48m7JiB46SYQ2HHe6E4MHELZ5Y.body: i also noticed that i have almost no upload. might this be because i am using tor mode?

> [smashbuckler](#comment_61_114yCZGnUqTUcasBbAKUS6xmhQyDPC1ZXt): Same goes for me on my other machine.Try visit Syncronite and follow the instructions i guess...

thanks for the answer. I will check it out

> [grouch0](#comment_18_1CrFEcv59gAFWe7w5wbKxCYJg3sDg48tUt): Go to configuration and paste this line  "zero://trackd5xiih3z7xyvvkyz2n65lehqziayjpxzsau3mwccwlelxrdrgid.onion:15442" at the end of the list in TrackersDiscover new peers using these addresses. [...]

thank you. Do you know where i can get those addional lists of torrent trackers to paste in "Trackers files"?
And another question, maybe @grouch0 you know, if i should open the File server port (in my firewall) when using Tor always mode. might this be an issue?

> [grouch0](#comment_18_1CrFEcv59gAFWe7w5wbKxCYJg3sDg48tUt): Go to configuration and paste this line  "zero://trackd5xiih3z7xyvvkyz2n65lehqziayjpxzsau3mwccwlelxrdrgid.onion:15442" at the end of the list in TrackersDiscover new peers using these addresses. [...]

i added both things but i still can connect to 0/26 trackers :/
apparently one issue was that i had to open port 9001/tcp for tor

> [grouch0](#comment_18_1CrFEcv59gAFWe7w5wbKxCYJg3sDg48tUt): paste this line "{datadir}/15CEFKBRHFfAP9rmL6hhLmHoXrrgmw4B5o/cache/1/_h.html" into the Trackers files

this did only work after i went to the page and copied the sites to the config directly

1610357675_1m1PsD5gwJ5xa9Rpt8JHr11wu9pqF.body: i hope he goes to jail soon

1611909944_1HTbdyz4zToxkxfmuYYfNVN1Y3U2y.body: i wish i could get it smh
